name: Annulus (TheOnlyQuarry)
description:
FREE DEMO!!! 

Annulus is an action-adventure role playing game with metroidvania elements. 

Enjoy tight dashing controls and fast-paced shoot and slash  action while exploring a vast and mysterious  space vessel here to reap all the energy from your planet.

Navigate the corridors of the Annulus and power different rooms on or off to progress. Pick up tools along the way and become strong enough to face the enemies within.
